# C# Language

> The C# programming languageâ€”syntax, features, and best practices. Covers language fundamentals, LINQ, async/await, pattern matching, records, and the latest C# 14 features. Includes language reference, tutorials, and what's new guides.

*Topics available: 1130*

- [System.Delegate and the `delegate` keyword](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/delegate-class.md): Learn about the classes in .NET that support delegates and how those map to the 'delegate' keyword.
- [Introduction to delegates and events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/delegates-overview.md): The first in a series of articles about C# delegates and events. This article introduces basic concepts and discusses language design goals for delegates.
- [Common Patterns for Delegates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/delegates-patterns.md): Learn about common patterns for using delegates in your code to avoid strong coupling between your components.
- [Strongly Typed Delegates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/delegates-strongly-typed.md): Learn how to use generic delegate types to declare custom types when creating a feature requiring delegates.
- [Delegates vs. events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/distinguish-delegates-events.md): Learn the difference between delegates and events and when to use each of these features of .NET Core.
- [Standard .NET event patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/event-pattern.md): Learn about .NET event patterns and how to create standard event sources and subscribe and process standard events in your code.
- [Introduction to events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/events-overview.md): Learn about events in .NET and our language design goals for events in this overview.
- [Iterators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/iterators.md): Learn how to use built-in C# iterators and how to create your own custom iterator methods.
- [Overview of methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/methods.md): Overview of methods, method parameters, and method return values
- [The Updated .NET Core Event Pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/modern-events.md): Learn how the .NET Core event pattern enables flexibility with backwards compatibility and how to implement safe event processing with async subscribers.
- [Update your codebase to use nullable reference types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/nullable-migration-strategies.md): Learn nullable contexts, how to enable or disable warnings and annotations, and how to diagnose and fix possible null dereferencing issues.
- [Nullable reference types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/nullable-references.md): This article provides an overview of nullable reference types. Learn how the feature provides safety against null reference exceptions, for new and existing projects.
- [Versioning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/versioning.md): Understand how versioning works in C# and .NET

## Subtopics

- [Async Programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/asynchronous-programming/llms.txt): 9 topics; Non-blocking code with `async`/`await` and Task-based patterns.
- [How to articles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/how-to/llms.txt): 7 topics; How to articles documentation and reference.
- [C# Language Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/llms.txt): 4 topics, 343 in tree; Keywords, operators, statements, types, and syntax reference.
- [LINQ in C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/llms.txt): 6 topics, 22 in tree; Query data with `Where`, `Select`, `OrderBy`, and `GroupBy`.
- [Misc Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/misc/llms.txt): 540 topics; Misc Docs documentation and reference.
- [The .NET Compiler Platform SDK (Roslyn APIs)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/llms.txt): 7 topics; The .NET Compiler Platform SDK (Roslyn APIs) documentation and reference.
- [Specification Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/specification/llms.txt): 2 topics; Specification Docs documentation and reference.
- [Tour of C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/llms.txt): 5 topics, 12 in tree; Introduction to C# syntax, types, and core concepts for new developers.
- [Tutorials Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/tutorials/llms.txt): 9 topics; Tutorials Docs documentation and reference.
- [What's New in C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/whats-new/llms.txt): 7 topics; New features by C# version: primary constructors, records, and more.
